ModMetaData.description:
Update of okmkzs mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=811181658 Based on the 1.0 version updated by Paladin https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1677669693
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/O21BarbedWire
--- Paladins additions --- Raiders will destroy it if they are given no route into the base or better target to attack, much like power cables. I do not intend to change this behaviour. This version removes an issue with the old unofficial update which caused issues in other mods by overwriting vanilla abstracts unnecessarily.
--- Original Description --- Adds barbed wire, a simple defensive structure that slows movement and provides minimal cover
